text.content:
Psychology at character creation

  • Humans: Choose up to 2 more @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.klCJX0mNpXYH5AIx]{Prejudices} for +20 XP each. You can also take a single @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.5hH73j2NgPdsLCZN]{Hatred} or @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.traits.Item.0VpT5yubw4UL7j6f]{Animosity} to support your background, but gain no XP for this.

  • Dwarfs: Choose up to 3 more @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.klCJX0mNpXYH5AIx]{Prejudices} for +10 XP each. And 1 @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.5hH73j2NgPdsLCZN]{Hatred} for 10 XP. Animosity (Elves) is an optional free extra (but only if there are no Elves in the party). Can take 1 extra Hatred to support your background, but gain no XP for this.

  • Elves: Choose extra @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.klCJX0mNpXYH5AIx]{Prejudices} (no limit - sniffy Elves) and another @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.Q2MCUrG2HppMcvN0]{Animosity}, all to support your background, but gain no XP.

  • Halflings: Cannot choose Prejudices, Animosities, or Hatreds at all at chargen. You can add @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.jbQDTxc4QNZDLaXm]{Love}, @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.psychologies.Item.EBmSCscpk4vEDCD3]{Camaraderie}, or similar @UUID[JournalEntry.NS3YGlJQxwTggjRX.JournalEntryPage.5w5YLPNd6AaU4f85#custom-psychology]{Custom Psychologies}, but gain no XP for this.

Skill Changes

  • A Character cannot take more advances into @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.skills.Item.2Y91ebFapH6zRfHk]{Ranged (Engineering)} than it has advances in @UUID[Compendium.wfrp4e-core.skills.Item.osMw1Be6YgRBolTm]{Lore (Engineering)}
